QuestData.Title: The Road to Falcon Watch
QuestData.Description: <The battered blood elf's face displays relief at your presence.>$B$BPlease, $c, get me out of this cage! I foolishly set out from Thrallmar ahead of the main group, despite Martik Tor'seldori's warnings.$B$BI was set upon by horrible creatures that could only be the ravagers he talked about. I managed to drive them off, but that was only the beginning of my troubles.$B$BAs I bound my wounds, those bird men found me, dragged me back to this cave, and locked me in this cage! I must get to Falcon Watch!
QuestData.AreaDescription: Escort Wounded Blood Elf Pilgrim to Falcon Watch
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect the Wounded Blood Elf Pilgrim on her way to Falcon Watch, then speak with Taleris Dawngazer.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Taleris Dawngazer at Falcon Watch in Hellfire Peninsula.
QuestData.RewardText: <Taleris shouts to several of the blood elves at the outpost.>$B$BGet her inside and see to her wounds!$B$B<Taleris turns back to you.>$B$BShe's fortunate that you found her when you did, $C. I don't think she'd have lasted much longer out there.$B$BCan you make out what she was saying?
